titleStmt.title: The plagues of Northomberland To the tune of appelles.
titleStmt.author: Barker, John, ballad writer.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestreate beneath the conduyt, at the signe of saint, Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Verse -- "When that the moone, in Northomberland,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
